thread.title: Reward offered for information leading to arrest after man killed in Sunrise
thread.title_full: Reward offered for information leading to arrest after man killed in Sunrise

author: Ryan Mackey
title: Reward offered for information leading to arrest after man killed in Sunrise
text:
SUNRISE, Fla. – Broward Crime Stoppers is offering a reward of up to $10,000 for information that leads to an arrest after a man was shot dead this past weekend in Sunrise.
Leer en español
Recommended Videos
Authorities said Derrick Green Jr. was shot dead around midnight on Sunday near the 3000 block of Northwest 60th Avenue.
Crime Stoppers released a photo of a gray sedan believed to be connected to the incident.
Suspect car (Broward Crime Stoppers) Police have not publicly identified a suspect in the shooting.
Anyone with information is urged to call Broward Crime Stoppers at 954-493-8477.
